archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Remove Party Demographic
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Remove a party demographic, either by deleting it or indicating it is no longer valid.

properties.value: Remove Party Demographic removes a party demographic, either by deleting it or indicating it is no longer valid. For example, a party privacy agreement may specify that a certain fact about a part be removed via deletion after an agreed upon period of time; this is typically referred to "as the right to be forgotten".
